text:
Hello good people!

*How would you solve this case?* 
_Customer wants a customer service bot:_ 
• Handover/Escalation from Microsoft Copilot Studio to HubSpot Chat. 
• Several chats that can be escalated at the same time (Different sessions, with different representatives)
• Copilot as its UI (MS Bot framework)
• Website as data-source for Copilot Studio
Seems like the most obvious case is creating a public app etc. but is there any other ways to solve this? :bug:

Public app it is. 2 disjoint apps talking to each other may not be possible in the current setup without any api calls/third-party apps
Webhook-based workflow that triggers the app handovers, might be the ideal choice, just thinking

Hello there, the country in phone country code field is based on user IP and I have to change it to US by default (internet says that there is no inbuilt solution to change that behavior).

So I'm changing it using JS. I change the option using JS in `onFormReady` event and it works - the country changes. I also dispatch a `change` event to trigger all other necessary functions and it works (I console logged 'change' when the event happens) but the country code doesn't change. Country in select field changes, change event fires but the country code in the actual phone input doesn't get updated. Is there anything else I have to do or event to fire to make it work?
<@UQNEXHW14> good morning, checking in on this. A channel for this would be really helpful to work through some of the issues that I'm having that inevitably other people will have.
A reminder that this is a peer to peer collab space, and not to expect HubSpotter support in that channel
yea, I understand. Although I wonder how we can get more people in there...
If you're having issues with the HS cookie banner, here's a new channel to discuss: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C07NCTHHQJK>
I am creating a property in the contact and I edit the internal name when I click on create, I get this message

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.
I think it is when the internal name is modified by deleting the underscores and leaving a single text string linkedin_bio => linkedinbio

Hi, does anyone else has problems with properties in HubSpot? Our personalized tokens in marketing emails aren’t working at all, this started yesterday. Already contacted the support, waiting for the answer
Did you found any fix to this?
yes, that's my question how i display a softphone on HubSpot when crm is loaded? i am using free account. please guide me on this

Hi there!
We’re developing an app for HubSpot CRM, which is a call script builder for sales conversations. It integrates directly into contact, company, and deal records, allowing you to easily pull relevant data into scripts during calls and update record details in real-time.
We need a few enthusiastic users)) :innocent: to test the app in order to complete its moderation process on the HubSpot marketplace. We’d really appreciate it if you could install the app and try it out. Here’s the installation link: <https://app-eu1.HubSpot.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=5a2fa736-46aa-4b61-902b-a0cbc9507806&redirect_uri=https://callscriptprompter.com/HubSpot/install.html&scope=crm.objects.contacts.write%20oauth%20crm.objects.owners.read%20crm.objects.companies.write%20crm.objects.companies.read%20crm.objects.deals.read%20crm.objects.deals.write%20crm.objects.contacts.read|LINK TO INSTALL APP> .
The app requires the following scopes:
• Account information (so we can identify the user);
• Contact, company, and deal data (read and write) to import and insert fields into the scripts, as well as update record details.
After installing, you’ll be redirected to the app page, where you’ll need to either log in or create a new account in Call Script Prompter.
Thanks in advance for your help! :heart: Feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

You can use the Intersection Observer API to load the HubSpot meetings iframe only when it comes into view, which should help reduce the initial page load time and improve your PageSpeed Insights score(as it will not reflect in pagespeed insights).
